name: Projectiles
description:
Projectiles  is a two player game where pop culture characters shoot weapons or powers at each other and whoever got 5 hits on that person is the winner. There is different types of battles with: Green Arrow, Flash, Captain America, Venom, Sub Zero, Spiderman, and Leonardo from TMNT. 

NOTE: Use Full screen to get a better playing expierence

If it does not work while playing in browser there is an option to download it for free
